Title: The Kalimdor Cup's Introduction
Description:
The Riders of Azeroth have learned much from us, and now we test their mettle, as well as yours, dragonrider!

My bronze colleagues have traveled to Kalimdor to create new challenges. These three await you as an introduction to the many across the continent.

Are you up to the task?
ObjectivesText: Fly through the introductory Kalimdor Cup courses.
